data.title: Edward S. Raw Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Edward S. "Stan" Raw 63 of Kansas City Mo. beloved Husband, Father, Grandfather, and Brother. Passed away July 1st, 2018. Stan was born August 31st, 1954 in Kansas City Mo. Stan...
data.text:
Edward S. "Stan" Raw 63 of Kansas City Mo. beloved Husband, Father, Grandfather, and Brother. Passed away July 1st, 2018. Stan was born August 31st, 1954 in Kansas City Mo. Stan graduated from Raytown South High School in 1972. Stan was a many different talents from automotive work to commanding the road in an 18 wheeler , to doing everything he could to ensure that his family wanted for nothing. Stan was loved by many and will be missed by many more.

Stan was preceded in death by his parents Henry S. Raw and Betty L.Raw. Stan is survived by his wife Teresa Raw of Kansas City, Mo., Son and Daughter in law Dustin and Jennifer Raw of Raytown Mo., Son Jeremy Raw of Kansas City Mo., Daughter and Son in law Crystal and Eric Wilson of Blue Springs Mo., Sister and Brother in law Sonja and Don Gutteridge of Oklahoma City, OK. , Sister and Brother in law Cynthia and Steven Slater, and 8 Beautiful Grandchildren. Stan may be gone but never forgotten.

Service Information:

Service: 10AM, Monday, July 9, 2018 at Park Lawn Funeral Home

Visitation: 4-6PM, Sunday, July 8, 2018 at Park Lawn Funeral Home

Burial in Green Lawn Cemetery
